overview: Collection of three short films from Nova. "The Main Attraction" — Jeffrey Scott fantasizes about bartender Bo Richards dancing. They suck each other until Bo brings Jeffrey back to reality by putting the real flesh in Jeffrey's daydreaming mouth.  "It's The Life" — Giorgio Canali is taking a shower when his gardener joins him. They suck and fuck in the water and then move to the bedroom for a cum stimulating 69.  "Neighborhood Watch" — Brad Peters jerks off as he watches Jon King and Buddy Preston as the two suck each other outside Brad's balcony. All three meet in a store and go to Brad's place for a three way.
title: The Main Attraction
